page.title: 10School, Wickhambreaux.
page.content: The majority of children of primary age in our area come to{Wickhambreaux {School.}Every year we have a{fair in {May.}On the morning of the fair we put up stalls selling food, toys, books, plants etc. There are side shows as well. One of the main attractions is the dancing performance by the school children. This year Â£1000 was raised for the school. In late June we hold a{garden {party.}The garden party is really a big play. Each class has two or three songs to sing and a part in the play to act.The garden party is a nice occasion. In July{sportsday}is held. Sportsday is a competition made up of lots of races like running, jumping and novelty races. This year we are holding sportsday on Wickhambreaux's new recreation ground.
